message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value for you at $10,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored for you, aiming to provide you with the best possible value while maximizing my earnings. I believe this price reflects the true worth of the product and aligns with your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. Looking forward to your positive response.
